verses.verse: What wondrous love is this, O my soul, O my soul? What wondrous love is this, O my soul? What wondrous love is this That caused the Lord of bliss To bear the dreadful curse for my soul, for my soul; To bear the dreadful curse for my soul

To God and to the Lamb I will sing, I will sing; To God and to the Lamb, I will sing; To God and to the Lamb Who is the great I am, While millions join the theme, I will sing, I will sing; While millions join the theme, I will sing.
